response.overview: "Mayhem Redemption" features beautiful women, the most outrageous auto-action and non-stop coverage of the best truck events. In this edition, you'll go international with footage from the sickest shows all over North America. We'll Drag you from major events in California to shows in Arizona, Florida, Louisiana, Mississippi, Texas, Indiana, Las Vegas' SEMA show and even Canada. Watch close as the cars and girls come at you like a screaming burnout. All set to music from So Cal's hottest punk label, Lobster Records.
response.title: Mischief: Mayhem 2 - Redemption
